column2: "Oh? What's this, what's this?! Lisa's spotted yet another person with a strange feeling about them!"
"Aw goodness, <%me>! You're making Lisa jealous with all of these lovely and mysterious friends you keep bringing here!"
"Would you mind sharing this one with Lisa? Lisa's sure it'd feel lovely and mysterious, so she'd like to try shooting him."
"Lisa is Lisa, you know? It's a pleasure to meet you."
"Hehehehe. You're really on guard right now. Don't worry, Lisa won't do anything, you know?"
"By the way, you use guns, don't you? And you prefer... Snipers. Right?"
"When you got all defensive, you stiffened up for an instant and gathered all your strength into your legs, you know? You were going to try to get some distance, right?"
"However, your arms didn't really move. That means you aren't someone who has to ready your gun; you're someone who materializes your gun. Right?"
"...You figured all that out from just a little handshake?"
"Hehehe. Keen eyes are necessary for snipers. Our most valuable asset on the battlefield is our ability to catch anything that's out of place, after all."
"AH! This won't do, this won't do! Lisa was so happy to meet someone like her, she just started rambling on and on!"
"Anyways, Lisa will be taking her leave now! Lisa wants to go back to Earth and shoot and shoot and shoot and kill more of those Phantoms."
"Those things feel so fluffy and out of place and really gross, but in a good way! Hehe. Hehehehehe!"
"...Hey, do people in ARKS tend to get weirder as they get stronger or something?"
